mapper.sql: id, name, clanName, clanTag, profilePath, favoriteRace, points, wins, losses, joinTime, league, ladderid
mapper.insert:

id,
name,
clanName,
clanTag,
profilePath,
favoriteRace,
points,
wins,
losses,

mapper.update:
update player
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clanName = #{clanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clanTag = #{clantag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profilePath = #{profilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
favoriteRace = #{favoriterace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wins = #{wins,jdbcType=INTEGER},
losses = #{losses,jdbcType=INTEGER},
joinTime = #{jointime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
league = #{league,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ladderid = #{ladderid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update player set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clanName = #{clanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clanTag = #{clantag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profilePath = #{profilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, favoriteRace = #{favoriterace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wins = #{wins,jdbcType=INTEGER}, losses = #{losses,jdbcType=INTEGER}, joinTime = #{jointime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, league = #{league,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ladderid = #{ladderid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM player WHERE 1 = 1
AND name LIKE '%${_parameter}%'
ORDER BY CASE WHEN league = 'GRANDMASTER' THEN 1 WHEN league = 'MASTER' THEN 2 WHEN league = 'DIAMOND' THEN 3 WHEN league = 'PLATINUM' THEN 4 WHEN league = 'GOLD' THEN 5 WHEN league = 'SILVER' THEN 6 WHEN league = 'BRONZE' THEN 7 END , points DESC

SELECT
FROM player WHERE 1 = 1
AND clanTag = #{_parameter, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY CASE WHEN league = 'GRANDMASTER' THEN 1 WHEN league = 'MASTER' THEN 2 WHEN league = 'DIAMOND' THEN 3 WHEN league = 'PLATINUM' THEN 4 WHEN league = 'GOLD' THEN 5 WHEN league = 'SILVER' THEN 6 WHEN league = 'BRONZE' THEN 7 END , points DESC

SELECT
FROM player WHERE 1 = 1
AND league = #{_parameter, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY CASE WHEN league = 'GRANDMASTER' THEN 1 WHEN league = 'MASTER' THEN 2 WHEN league = 'DIAMOND' THEN 3 WHEN league = 'PLATINUM' THEN 4 WHEN league = 'GOLD' THEN 5 WHEN league = 'SILVER' THEN 6 WHEN league = 'BRONZE' THEN 7 END , points DESC
